description: The high-necked, super-thick Svalbard sweater is made to look authentically ‘hand-made’ and has a full two-coloured pattern, so that the small pieces of leftover threads remain on the inside of the sweater, providing extra insulation. The Italian designer Olmes Caretti was inspired by traditional Norwegian knitwear, but reveals a secret behind the bright red colour: “I grew up right next to the Ferrari factory.” <br><br>100% pure new wool from Norwegian sheep. The sweaters with zip neck has a chin guard that prevents chafing caused by the zipper. Knitted as a two-coloured full Jacqard. Comfortable ribbed bottom of the sleeves and body.
name: Svalbard Wool Zip Neck - Unisex
